constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The amendment of Condition 5 would result in an unacceptable loss of privacy and overlooking to neighbouring property No.12 Branksome Way, especially if this neighbour sought to install similar windows in a similar position. As such the proposed development is contrary to the NPPF 2023, Policies D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012.
description: Variation of Condition Application under Section 73A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 5 (Window Level) of planning permission 21/01595/HOU (Demolition of existing conservatory. Erection of single storey rear extension and first floor side extension with associated changes to fenestration. Rear and side dormer roof extensions with chimney stack removal and installation of 2no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion) to allow part openable window.
